languages.text: "Токмо порядку мало. Как война была, так и не стало порядку. Знать-то сильно испужалась бунтов, ирригационные комплексы побросала, в столицу удрала, да так и не вернулась. Боятся, что остались в их поместьях заговорщики, что им в ночи кровь пустят".

"Can't say our lives are all in order, though. The war ended all that. The nobles were so scared of the riots that they abandoned the irrigation facilities and skedaddled to the capital for good. Too afraid there are still conspirators hiding on their estates, waiting to gut them at night."
languages.original_text: "Токмо порядку мало. Как война была, так и не стало порядку. Знать-то сильно испужалась бунтов, ирригационные комплексы побросала, в столицу удрала, да так и не вернулась. Боятся, что остались в их поместьях заговорщики, что им в ночи кровь пустят".

traits.locale_text: "Can't say our lives are all in order, though. The war ended all that. No more order for us. The nobles were so scared of the riots that they abandoned the irrigation facilities and skedaddled for the capital. They never came back. Too afraid there might still be conspirators hiding in their estates, waiting to gut them in the night."

"Can't say our lives are all in order, though. The war ended all that. No more order for us. The nobles were so scared of the riots that they abandoned the irrigation facilities and skedaddled for the capital. They never came back. Too afraid there might still be conspirators hiding in their estates, waiting to gut them in the night."

"Can't say our lives are all in order, though. The war ended all that. The nobles were so scared of the riots that they abandoned the irrigation facilities and skedaddled to the capital for good. Too afraid there are still conspirators hiding in their estates, waiting to gut them at night."

"Can't say our lives are all in order, though. The war ended all that. The nobles were so scared of the riots that they abandoned the irrigation facilities and skedaddled to the capital for good. Too afraid there are still conspirators hiding in their estates, waiting to gut them at night."

"Can't say our lives are all in order, though. The war ended all that. The nobles were so scared of the riots that they abandoned the irrigation facilities and skedaddled to the capital for good. Too afraid there are still conspirators hiding on their estates, waiting to gut them at night."

"Can't say our lives are all in order, though. The war ended all that. The nobles were so scared of the riots that they abandoned the irrigation facilities and skedaddled to the capital for good. Too afraid there are still conspirators hiding on their estates, waiting to gut them at night."

languages.text: “我们的生活还算不上安定，一切都被战争毁了。那些贵族们害怕爆发暴乱，他们放弃了灌溉设施，逃回了首都，再也不回来了。他们害怕有叛乱分子躲在庄园里，趁黑灯瞎火的时候把他们肠子挖了。”
languages.original_text: "Can't say our lives are all in order, though. The war ended all that. The nobles were so scared of the riots that they abandoned the irrigation facilities and skedaddled to the capital for good. Too afraid there are still conspirators hiding on their estates, waiting to gut them at night."

traits.locale_text: “我们的生活还算不上安定，一切都被战争毁了。那些贵族们害怕爆发暴乱，他们放弃了灌溉设施，逃回了首都，再也不回来了。他们害怕有叛乱分子躲在庄园里，趁黑灯瞎火的时候把他们肠子挖了。”

languages.text: 「我々の人生に秩序があるとは言えませんがね。戦争は、全秩序を壊しました。貴族は反逆者を恐るあまり、灌漑施設を放棄し首都に向かいました。彼らの家のどこかに陰謀家が隠れているのではないかと、そしていつか夜に襲われるのではないかと、酷く恐れていましたから」
languages.original_text: "Can't say our lives are all in order, though. The war ended all that. The nobles were so scared of the riots that they abandoned the irrigation facilities and skedaddled to the capital for good. Too afraid there are still conspirators hiding on their estates, waiting to gut them at night."

traits.locale_text: 「我々の人生に秩序があるとは言えませんがね。戦争は、全秩序を壊しました。貴族は反逆者を恐るあまり、灌漑施設を放棄し首都に向かいました。彼らの家のどこかに陰謀家が隠れているのではないかと、そしていつか夜に襲われるのではないかと、酷く恐れていましたから」

languages.text: «Tampoco es que la vida sea un camino de rosas. La guerra nos ha dejado bien fastidiados. Los nobles tenían tanto miedo a las revueltas que abandonaron las instalaciones de riego y huyeron a la capital. Siguen con miedo de que queden conspiradores en sus tierras, esperando el momento de destriparlos por la noche».
languages.original_text: "Can't say our lives are all in order, though. The war ended all that. The nobles were so scared of the riots that they abandoned the irrigation facilities and skedaddled to the capital for good. Too afraid there are still conspirators hiding on their estates, waiting to gut them at night."

traits.locale_text: «Tampoco es que la vida sea un camino de rosas. La guerra nos ha dejado bien fastidiados. Los nobles tenían tanto miedo a las revueltas que abandonaron las instalaciones de riego y huyeron a la capital. Siguen con miedo de que queden conspiradores en sus tierras, esperando el momento de destriparlos por la noche».

languages.text: "Kann aber nicht behaupten, dass unser Leben sonderlich prächtig ist. Das war mit dem Krieg vorbei. Die Adligen hatten solche Angst vor den Aufständen, dass sie die Bewässerungsanlagen aufgegeben haben und für immer in die Hauptstadt abgezischt sind. Hatten zu große Angst, dass sich in ihren Villen noch Verschwörer verstecken und darauf warten, sie nachts aufzuschlitzen."
languages.original_text: "Can't say our lives are all in order, though. The war ended all that. The nobles were so scared of the riots that they abandoned the irrigation facilities and skedaddled to the capital for good. Too afraid there are still conspirators hiding on their estates, waiting to gut them at night."

traits.locale_text: "Kann aber nicht behaupten, dass unser Leben sonderlich prächtig ist. Das war mit dem Krieg vorbei. Die Adligen hatten solche Angst vor den Aufständen, dass sie die Bewässerungsanlagen aufgegeben haben und für immer in die Hauptstadt abgezischt sind. Hatten zu große Angst, dass sich in ihren Villen noch Verschwörer verstecken und darauf warten, sie nachts aufzuschlitzen."

languages.text: « Mais on peut pas dire que tout soit rose. La guerre a mis fin à tout ça. Les nobles avaient tellement peur des révoltes qu'ils ont abandonné les systèmes d'irrigation et filé se réfugier dans la capitale. Ils devaient croire qu'il restait encore des conspirateurs dans leurs domaines, prêts à les égorger dans leur sommeil. »
languages.original_text: "Can't say our lives are all in order, though. The war ended all that. The nobles were so scared of the riots that they abandoned the irrigation facilities and skedaddled to the capital for good. Too afraid there are still conspirators hiding on their estates, waiting to gut them at night."

traits.locale_text: « Mais on peut pas dire que tout soit rose. La guerre a mis fin à tout ça. Les nobles avaient tellement peur des révoltes qu'ils ont abandonné les systèmes d'irrigation et filé se réfugier dans la capitale. Ils devaient croire qu'il restait encore des conspirateurs dans leurs domaines, prêts à les égorger dans leur sommeil. »

languages.text: "Yine de hayatımız güllük gülistanlık, demek güç. Savaştan beri belimiz doğrulmadı. İsyanlardan korktu soylular, sulama tesislerini bıraktılar. Tası tarağı toplayıp başkente kaçtılar. Hanelerine sızmış hain vardır, gece gelip gırtlaklarını keser diye korktular."
languages.original_text: "Can't say our lives are all in order, though. The war ended all that. The nobles were so scared of the riots that they abandoned the irrigation facilities and skedaddled to the capital for good. Too afraid there are still conspirators hiding on their estates, waiting to gut them at night."

traits.locale_text: "Yine de hayatımız güllük gülistanlık, demek güç. Savaştan beri belimiz doğrulmadı. İsyanlardan korktu soylular, sulama tesislerini bıraktılar. Tası tarağı toplayıp başkente kaçtılar. Hanelerine sızmış hain vardır, gece gelip gırtlaklarını keser diye korktular."
